adrFormatAddress: 458 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10037, USA

originalText.text: Waaay overpriced, basically because they're the only cleaners in my nearby area. They wanted to charge me $53.00 to clean a waist-length down jacket that I bought on sale for $39.99 on eBay. GTFOH! Will buy some tennis balls, and wash it myself.

text.text: Waaay overpriced, basically because they're the only cleaners in my nearby area. They wanted to charge me $53.00 to clean a waist-length down jacket that I bought on sale for $39.99 on eBay. GTFOH! Will buy some tennis balls, and wash it myself.

originalText.text:
I just had a blouse cleaned. I was charged $9.00 because it's linen. The front detailed area was not ironed properly,  and the person at the desk just said, "they ironed it hard" (whatever that means). He was indifferent to the issue and made no effort to take it back and have it ironed properly. I didn't insist on correction, but I should not have to pay $9 and then bring it home to iron it myself! For this reason, I will not patronize this place again.

UPDATE: Added 1 star to my review. After seeing my review, the owner credited me for the $9 paid.

originalText.text:
Warning: Poor and deceitful service! BEWARE - THEY LIKELY WET CLEAN EVERYTHING, despite claiming to offer dry cleaning services.

I brought my never-washed J.Crew suit pants for cleaning, but upon picking them up, I noticed the hem had shortened and the pants were significantly tighter. When I inquired about their policy for such issues, the counter attendant denied having washed my pants and claimed they never shrink garments. However, the man who took my order confirmed that they had cleaned them. The attendant glared at him for admitting it. The man then denied that they could shrink clothes, even when I showed him the measurements from the same pants I owned in a different color. They refused to provide a receipt for tax purposes and claimed that $5  would not make a difference. These are untrustworthy individuals!

Attached is a photograph of my ruined suit. The "dry cleaned" pants were discolored and ruined due to their wet cleaning process.

originalText.text: I've been using this dry cleaner for years, and have continued to use them even after leaving the neighborhood.  The quality, speed, and prices here are all top notch - and best of all I can reach out directly to the owner via text for updates.  I recently spilled paint on some expensive clothing - things that I thought would for sure have to be thrown away - and Danny and his team removed all the paint stains from my clothes.  This even includes my wife's leather purse!  Very very happy with this cleaner, and would highly recommend.

originalText.text: This cleaners is excellent in my thoughts i went there to getmy body measure up. Just taking a chance to see if they would help me. I offer the owner money for the measurements i need and he took the time out and help me out without me giving him any money. I was so appreciative that he help me i will always do business with him. I am a customer there as well. They also do excellent service for me and the community as well. Excellent cleaners in my area. Thanks so much for everything your doing.
